name: sliced in sauce
title: Vital Balance Sensitive · sliced in sauce · Tuna & carrots
description: Vital Balance sliced in sauce Tuna & carrots

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Meat and animal derivatives, Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives (of which Tuna 4%), Oils and fats, Derivatives of vegetable origin, minerals, Vegetables (0.6% dehydrated carrots, equivalent to 5.4% carrots), Various sugars.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional additives: IU/kg: Vit A: 1080; Vit D3: 151; Vit E: 300; mg/kg: Iron(II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 13); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 0.38); Copper(II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu:0.98); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn:1.8); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn:18); taurine: 490. Flavourings.

usageInformation.additionalInformation: With the delicious and nutritious PURINA VITAL BALANCE meals, developed by vets & nutritionists, you can be sure that she gets all the nutrients she needs every day for a visible sense of well-being. A complete &balanced formula specially developed for cats with sensitive digestion.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: For an average cat of 4 kg, feed 3 pouches per day in at least 2 separate mealsThe recommended daily amounts should be adjusted to weather conditions, cat’s level of activity and its physical condition. Serve at room temperature. Clean, fresh water should always be available

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.
